column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We were seated relatively quickly and began our culinary crusade (too soon?) through the treasures of Espana. Naturally
column2: we started our journey out right with a pitcher of passion fruit sangria. A pitcher of red and a pitcher of white
column3: and I think another pitcher of red were also ordered during the course of this meal. I thoroughly enjoyed all of them
column4: but I would have liked it a little stronger and with a little more fruit. It might be considered too sweet for some
column5: but I thought it was perfectly balanced.
